items.title: Nexum Personal Finance — Frontend
items.description: Frontend for a personal finance management app (accounts, categories, transactions, transfers, and monthly budgets), built with Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
items.backend: Private backend built with Spring Boot.
items.stack: Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Recharts, i18n
highlights: Well-structured state management designed for scale.
features: Authentication (login/register), email confirmation, and password recovery.
Dashboard with charts (Recharts) and analytics by period/budget.
UI i18n (progressively applied in key modules).
In-app user documentation inside the dashboard.
Backend includes email verification, password recovery, and Resend email delivery.

Managed employees, products, purchases, and internal sales.
Defined roles and permissions with Row Level Security (RLS).
Integrated purchasing, inventory adjustments, and product flows.
